title: Pomodoro E Basilico
description: Monthly (and on request) vegan supper club in Queen's Park by Italian baker and foodie, Sara, based in North West London. Also offering pasta making classes and catering for private dinners and parties. No animal ingredients are involved in her dishes, which are traditional Italian home-style comfort food that she grew up with in in Italy. Twitter: @PomoBasilico // Instagram: pomodoro_e_basilico. Previously located on Kilburn Lane.
